original_title: Dorothy, Ninette y un Billete de 50
overview: Dorothy and Ninette are two has-beens  trying to survive and let go of their demons. Two former showgirls in their sixties, they are unaware that they are no longer in their prime. They reconnect after several years, and old feuds resurface in the most instinctive and funny ways when neither one of them is willing to let go of a 50 Euro bill they found on the ground.
title: Dorothy, Ninette, and a 50 Euro Bill
